title: Radiance Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Thai, Western, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Resort restaurant offering a mostly raw and vegan food menu. Also offers classes in raw cuisine as well as cleansing programs. This is one of several locations (others in Koh Samui & Chiang Mai).
streetAddress: 15/4 moo 4 Baan Salak kok, Koh Chang Tai
